message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, and this price reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate your understanding of the product's value.  While $9,500 is a fair offer, I'm looking for something closer to $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet you at $10,500. I would like to propose $10,000 as a compromise.
